notes: Barmer District, Block RJ-ON-90-1. 3.6 billion barrels in-place.
Multiple wells in Barmer area. Primary producer.
India's largest oil platform. 160 km offshore.
World's largest refinery complex. 1.24M bbl/day capacity.
India's largest LNG terminal. 2.5M tonnes capacity.
Asia's first oil well (1866). Still operating.
